text: Galina Baranova (Russian: Галина Баранова; born April 1949) is a Soviet former long track speed skater, who was active in the 1970s. Baranova represented her nation at the World Allround Speed Skating Championships for Women in 1972, finishing 15th overall. She also competed at other international competitions. Between 1970 and 1974 she competed in total nine times at the Soviet Allround Championships and single distances championships. == Records== === Personal records === ==References== Category:1949 births Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Date of birth missing (living people) Category:Soviet female speed skaters Category:Living people
title: Galina Baranova
